itunes:title: Episode 357 - Special Guest Mark "Oz" Geist
title: Episode 357 - Special Guest Mark "Oz" Geist
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Jarred Taylor and Evan Hafer are joined by special guest Mark "Oz" Geist who was a member of the Annex Security Team that fought the Battle of Benghazi, Libya from September 11 to September 12, 2012, which was depicted in the film "13 Hours".  Mark is st...
itunes:summary:
Jarred Taylor and Evan Hafer are joined by special guest Mark "Oz" Geist who was a member of the Annex Security Team that fought the Battle of Benghazi, Libya from September 11 to September 12, 2012, which was depicted in the film "13 Hours".  Mark is still recovering from the injuries he sustained in the battle. He is a co-author of the New York Times bestselling book "13 Hours: The Inside Account of What Really Happened in Benghazi."  Great episode.
